name: Tea Fighter
description:
This is my first attempt to create a game for a game jam called TriJam in which a game is created within a 3-hour time limit. The topic is Tea Time. 

As being an Indian, there is a culture where whenever you have some kind of trouble or some sort of negativity. Just make a hot tea and drink it with your eyes closed. You will feel eternal bliss. I swear, my international friends if you happen to see any Indian restaurant nearby, just go there and have an Indian cup of tea. You will forget what is COFFEE!!

Zombies are portrayed as negative shit in our day to day life. 

5 problems, 1 solution = Tea!
